msContents.summary: Varia. F. i v: A miracle of Jesus Christ as a child: how he rode on a beam of the sun. F. ii v: Miracle of Saint Mika'el when a ship at sea was threatened by a storm. Miracles of Mary. F-6v: The Prayer of Mary for sinners which she prayed at Jesus' grave on Yakatit 16 (based on the prayer of Our Lady Mary at Golgotha). F: Hymn to Mary, “I Prostrate Before You,” እሰግድ፡ ለኪ፡. Répertoire 336/338. F-10r: Angels Praise Her, Yǝwedǝssǝwa Mäla’ǝkt, ይዌድስዋ፡ መላእክት፡ ለማርያም፡. Répertoire 388; MD 519ff. ; EMML 1593, . F-13r: Greeting to Mary, the ark of Noah, ሰላም፡ ለኪ፡ ማርያም፡ ለኅ፡ ሐመሩ፡. F-15r: Hymn to Mary, “Rejoice, Mary, Virgin in Body and Mind,” ተፈሥሒ፡ ማርያም፡ ድንግልተ፡ ሥጋ፡ ወሕሊና፡. Répertoire 303; IES 71. F-16r: Continuation of the hymn, I Prostrate Before You. F-108r: Thirty-Two Miracles of Mary. F-122v: The Homiliary of the Mother of Mercy, ድርሳን ዘእመ ምሕረት. F-130v: Image of the Covenant of Mercy, መልክአ፡ ኪዳነ፡ ምሕረት፡, incipit: እግዚአብሔር: ወሃቤ: ብርሃን: ዘይሤለስ በአካሉ።, Répertoire 362. Dillmann, Chrestomathia 136–46; MG 681–700. EMIP 499; 2073/Tweed 124. F-143v: Prayer of Our Lady Mary at Golgotha, Säne Golǝgota, ጸሎተ፡ እግዝእትነ፡ ማርያም፡ ዘሰኔ፡ ጎልጎታ፡. Copied and printed several times in its Gə‘əz and Amharic versions, e.g., ጸሎተ፡ እግዝእትነ፡ ማርያም፡ ዘሰኔ፡ ጎልጎታ፡ በመቃብረ፡ እግዚእነ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ (Addis Ababa: Täsfa, 1949 E.C.); ጸሎተ፡ እግዝእትነ፡ ማርያም፡ ዘሰኔ፡ ጎልጎታ፡ (Addis Ababa: Täsfa, 1963 E.C.); see also Grébaut, “La prière de Marie au Golgotha,” and Basset, Apocryphes 5 30 –47; StrLin 47, ; EMML 1213, . F-148r: Introduction to the Miracles of Mary, መቅድመ: ተአምረ: ማርያም: ዘሙዓልቃ:. F: Image of Mary, Répertoire 93, incipit: ሰላም ለኪ ኦማርያም ድንግል አሙ ለ እግዚአነ ኢየሱስ ክርስቶስ ከሃሊ. Varia. F, col 2-16v: Asmat prayer against the evil eye with the story of Jesus and the disciples at the Sea of Tiberias, Ṣälota Nǝdra, ጸሎተ፡ ንድራ፡. EMIP Magic Scroll 3:1; Or. 4865 (StrBL 121). Cf. AbbCat 143, ; Notice 109. , col. 2: Prayer of supplication for six individuals. Notes. F. ii r, bottom: Primary note of ownership: This book belongs to አጻዳ ማርያም and his father, አዳራ ጊዮርጊስ, and his mother, ቢሩታዊት, who bought it with his own means. Condemned by the authority of Peter and Paul is the one who steals or erases it." A secondary owner has written their names above the original owners: ዘርቤታ ድንግል, whose father is ኪዳነ ማርያም, and whose mother is ወላተ ተክለ ሃይማኖት. F. ii r, column 2: Note of later ownership by church: This book is the property of ደብረ ኢየሱስ church and was given by ወለተ ተክላ ሃይማኖት, her father was ዘዉገ ሚካኤል, and her brothers were ገብረ መድኀን and ገብረ ሥላሴ, and her mother was ሐመረ ኪዳን. F. iiir: Introdution to the Miracles of Mary, daily reading.
